price: 119. Kaadu diggah atu tet addal bakaare waytaah ayrite waytam lito.
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
